metadata.title: Ocular Examination and Cor neal Surface Disease in the Ferret

abstract.original_text: Ferret Ophthalmology Cornea Mustela Corneal scar Eyes

sentences.segment_text: Ferret Ophthalmology Cornea Mustela Corneal scar Eyes

abstract.original_text: Ocular examination of the ferret can be challenging and requires a systematic approach.

sentences.segment_text: Ocular examination of the ferret can be challenging and requires a systematic approach .

abstract.original_text: Ferrets eyes are small and relatively well protected but they can still experience corneal surface trauma.
